resources.string: Viewing and sharing all the pending submissions of the students of your Google Classroom is now a lot more easier than ever.
Kindly sign-in using your teacher Google account to continue.
Could not load the courses due to an unexpected error.

We could not find any course in your Google Classrooms where you are a teacher. 

 Are you sure about the account you selected while logging in? (%s). 


 If not, then log out from the current account using the action button on the top-right corner of the screen and try selecting the expected Google account the next time you log in. 

or

 Create a new class or join an existing class as a teacher and then refresh the app by swiping from top to bottom while the refresh indicator appear.
Note: You\'re currently viewing only those Google Classrooms where you play the role of a teacher.
Hello World, here are all your assignments
No assignments were found in this classroom.
